Package com.EventBus

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventBus
    EventBus interface defines the core methods for event distribution in a publish/subscribe system.
    FilteringService
    FilteringService is an interface for various Filtering or Enhanced event services that can be provided by the EventBus.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncBusBasicTest  
    AsyncBusCacheLatestEventTest  
    AsyncBusCallbackReentrantTest  
    AsyncBusFilterEventTest  
    AsyncBusMultiThreadTest
    Simple volume and Event ordering test for multithreaded bus with multiple subscribers Created by Mustaq on 2/26/2017.
    AsyncBusThreadHashDistributionTest
    Test to make sure the thread pool load is distributed as expected using hash function Created by Mustaq on 2/26/2017.
    AsyncEventBus
    An AsyncEventBus is a multi threaded implementation of the EventBus interface.
    AsyncSynEventHandler
    An AsyncEventHandler provides services to AsyncEventBus for implementing multi threaded event delivery, event filtering for a subscriber, and caching of latest event for an event type requested by subscribers.
    EventBusExceptionHandler
    EventBusExceptionHandler is the single place to handle all EventBus exceptions.
    EventBusTester
    Simple stub for EventBus testing Created by Mustaq on 2/24/2017.
    SubscriberHandler
    A SubscriberHandler is a class that performs extraction of a subscriber's callback methods when that subscriber is added; it holds the all information related to event subscriptions for many subscribers; and provides subscriptions list to event handlers during event publication.
    Subscription<T>
    A Subscription<T> is primarily a data abstraction within the bus.
    SuperBulkTest
    A volume test for Single threaded EventBus Created by Mustaq on 2/23/2017.
    SyncEventBus
    A SyncEventBus is an implementation of EventBus interface meant to operate in a single threaded mode.
    SyncEventBusBasicTest
    Basic test for single threaded Event bus Created by Mustaq on 2/23/2017.
    SyncEventBusReentrantTest
    Test the Nested / Recursive / Reentrant publishing for single thread buses.
    SynEventHandler
    A SyncEventHandler is the main class that handles event delivery for a single threaded bus.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EventBusException
    Runtime exceptions thrown by handlers and subscribers code are abstracted as EventBusException.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Subscribe
    Marks a method as an event subscriber.
